issue.title: ray sensor go through the wall return inf value

content.raw:
Sorry, it's very hard to reproduce the issue, cause the ray sensor work normally most of time, and the return value is correct, I use it as infrared sensor of a robot vacuum cleaner to do wall follow, when I test the wall follow code in gazebo,  but I encounter into the problem not every time, perhaps,  every 10 times or less , so I still don’t know how to reproduce it. thank you for your attention !

‌
